item.title: By: Matt White

item.description: <p>Richard,<br /><br />Thanks for the heads up, bet you can't guess where we took the DB design from!<br /><br />Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Richard,

Thanks for the heads up, bet you can’t guess where we took the DB design from!

Matt
